tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_data (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name TEXT,
  research_topic TEXT,
  research_data TEXT,
  consent_given BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE study_participants (
  participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  consent_given BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE research_data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id UUID REFERENCES study_participants(participant_id),
  research_study_name VARCHAR(100),
  data_collected TEXT,
  data_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  data_analyzed BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participant_age INT,
    participant_gender VARCHAR(10),
    consent_given BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchStudies (
    study_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    study_description TEXT,
    lead_researcher VARCHAR(255),
    study_start_date DATE,
    study_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE StudyData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id UUID REFERENCES ResearchStudies(study_id),
    participant_id UUID REFERENCES Participants(participant_id),
    data_collected JSON,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Studies (
    study_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    study_description TEXT,
    study_start_date DATE,
    study_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participant_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    participant_age INT,
    participant_gender VARCHAR(10) 
)

CREATE TABLE StudyData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id UUID REFERENCES Studies(study_id),
    participant_id UUID REFERENCES Participants(participant_id),
    data_values JSONB,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ConsentForms (
    form_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id UUID REFERENCES Participants(participant_id),
    consent_text TEXT,
    consent_given BOOLEAN,
    consent_timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE studies (
    study_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(255),
    study_description TEXT,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    ethical_approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    consent_given BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE data_collection (
    collection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id UUID,
    participant_id INT,
    data_collected TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES studies(study_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id UUID,
    analysis_results TEXT,
    analyzed_by VARCHAR(100),
    analysis_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES studies(study_id)
);

CREATE TABLE consent_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id UUID,
    participant_id INT,
    consent_status BOOLEAN,
    consent_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES studies(study_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);
